item.description: Osushi no byuffe event desu! On Sunday we'll be having a buffet lunch event at a new Japanese restaurant on Newbury Street. We've reserved this great spot for a limited time, and space is also limited so sign up quickly! This is a great opportunity to check out what is sure to become a popular new addition to Newbury Street. Come network with Japanese locals and meet new people while enjoying amazing food. Bring your friends! Date: Sunday, October 23rd, 12:00-2:00pm* *We recommend that you arrive at noon. Since this is a buffet-style lunch, we can't guarantee there will be food left if you get there late!   Place: Umai Restaurant, 244 Newbury Street, Boston MA 02116 Closest MBTA stop: Copley (green line) Admission: $20 JREX members, $25 non-members (Buffet includes various types of sushi as well as salad and miso soup. Price includes tax and tip. Alcohol is not included but can be purchased separately.) Please register at (kochira no site yori goyoyaku kudasai!) www.jrex.us. to hold your place. Space is limited to 30 so please RSVP and make the payment through Paypal otherwise your seat is not guaranteed. Hope to see you then! Tamami (JREX is a non-profit organization which supports Japanese small businesses, prospective business owners and entrepreneurs in the New England area.)
item.how_to_find_us: The venue is reserved for the event
item.name: "Umai" Buffet Lunch! - JREX mingling event
